name: Courtroom Calamity (Kick The Dust)
description:
Courtroom Calamity was made for the Tolhouse Gaol in Great Yarmouth as a part of the Kick the Dust project. It's designed to try and get kids more interested in history as well as being entertaining to play! We'd appreciate if you can give us a look.

Note: The game is designed to be open to public. We passworded the Admin area where you can close the game and reset the scoreboard. The password is Gaol2020
